content: free no-sew small pocket frog pattern about thank you for downlaoding my pattern andi hope you will enjoy this pattern please do not claim this pattern as your own copy it or sell it you may happily sell finished products if you use this pattern please tag me @naomi _ crochet on instagram so i can see your creations materials abbreviations chenille yarn i used magic_ring magic_ring himalya dolphin baby single_crochet single_crochet 100g/120mt increase increase 4 5mm crochet hook decrease decrease 8mm saftey eyes 4dc bbl st 4dc double scissors crochet bobble stitch sewing needle r round stuffing f o fasten_off stitch marker pattern created by @naomi _ crochet free no-sew small pocket frog pattern the pattern r1 6sc in a magic_ring 6 r2 6inc 12 r3 2inc 2sc 4dc bbl st 2sc 4dc bbl st 2sc 2inc 16 r4 - 5 single_crochet around 16 r6 2sc 4dc bbl st 2sc 4dc bbl st 5sc 4dc bbl st 2sc 4dc bbl st 1sc 16 *add safety eyes in the bbl stitches in row 3* r7 8dec 8 *stuff the frog* r8 4dec 4 f o and sew the hole closed you can sew a little mouth one row below the eyes between both of them congrats you just finished your small pocket frog pattern created by @naomi _ crochet
